alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 9:29PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Union and northwestern Clarke Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 929 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Lakeside Casino, or 9 miles west of Osceola, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail and additional rainfall up to one inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. Locations impacted include... Osceola, Lakeside Casino, Murray, Thayer and Murray Roadside Rest Area. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 31 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Iowa.
